name: Survive the desert (IvanCF)
description:
How to play:

Find the 3 magic lamps before you dehydrate, for that you must find small bottles of water hidden on the ground, which will be full of enemies.Good luck!   

Controls:

W, A, S, D = Movement  /  Left click & Right click = Shoot  /   Space = Jump  

Game created by: Iván Carrizosa.
